reviews.text:
Nothing is related to Pazhassi Raja. It’s just a honour to him.

Museum is at east hill which was one of administrative block of British rule in Malabar. Well maintained and guide at museum help us to know the history of all artefacts displayed. No photos allowed. Best for one day trip especially school children.
A nice sport for relaxation and also a heritage place. Alots of things to study and a wonderful experience will get from there. Need to go there

Some interesting artefacts here. But the low budget allocation is obvious. They have done the best they can to maintain the museum, but the lack of resources is a big let down. And the artefacts themselves are nothing to write home about. A few clay pots and weapons catch your attention. 

Visit, if only if you are in the area.

This is located near to Calicut staff over here are not cooperative. you have to keep the exact change in your hand otherwise they will not I love you inside if you don't have change there is no option to enter inside.. card swiping also not available...
Quite informative; came across articles og bygone era. Engrossing. The guide ther, English speaking, trained was quite helpful. Time usefully spent..
Situated in the heart of city.Awesome place to hangout with friends. Friends can sit together for long time . Burgers are awesome in taste. All food items are good in taste.
Love to come here, after my coaching classes. It is very nice place for sitting with friends
Well !!!! Who doesn’t know abt Mcdonald 😄❤️ and i think 90% foodies will prefer to take a quick hunger break here. I request those 10% to fill the gap sooner the better 🔥 🔥🔥

It is situated in the Atlantis mall Civil lines......Prayagraj...... 
You all are well aware of the fact that it is a place mostly crowded.... it promotes self service.... the menu is being displayed on the screen above counters.... very limited items are there in this mcD Allahabad...  but it will be freshly prepared and served hot.... drinking water is available for free but one have to ask for it..... its affordable...... one cannot have a cosy atmosphere or a silent atmosphere since its generally over crowded....

I recommend you to taste ice creams...

I would prefer KFC for burgers. But if u want something lite than you ho for it.
The place is always crowded. Try the mcflurry and allu ticki
